body:
Indeed, happy holidays and best wishes for 2012, all. This is a great community and I am indebted to many of you over the years, between input, feedback, advice, job references, jobs, and most of all, inspiration. This is a great, weird little global family and I feel privileged to be a part of it.


May 2012 (I mean all of 2012, not just May of 2012) bring you all a good time. 


- Rob G.




On Dec 24, 2011, at 9:37 AM, Greg Ward wrote:
